effects: Increase DEF by 60% for 99999 turns to caster
30% chance to counter physical attacks (1x, ATK) to caster for 99999 turns
name: I've leveled up! You've grown as well!
I've leveled up! You've grown as well!
升級了 你也成長了啊
¡He subido de nivel, y tú también!
desc_short: Boost own DEF and temporarily increase chance of countering physical attacks
提高自身防禦的數值+暫時受到物理攻擊時一定機率發動反擊
Aumenta la DEF y aumenta temporalmente la posibilidad de devolver ataques físicos
